properties.name: group_control_3
properties.headerText: No.CriteriaYes/NoComments

properties.name: richtext_label_9
properties.text: The job warrants working the extra time?
properties.textTranslation: The job warrants working the extra time?

properties.name: richtext_label_11
properties.text: Fatigue Assessment Checklist SR-221 Completed?(For >14 hr approvals only where fatigue is suspected)
properties.textTranslation: Fatigue Assessment Checklist SR-221 Completed?(For >14 hr approvals only where fatigue is suspected)

properties.name: richtext_label_17
properties.text: Job will take < 16 hours (total including travel) to complete?
properties.textTranslation: Job will take < 16 hours (total including travel) to complete?

properties.name: richtext_label_19
properties.text: The number of hours worked in the immediately preceding day < 14 hours?
properties.textTranslation: The number of hours worked in the immediately preceding day < 14 hours?

properties.name: richtext_label_23
properties.text: The technician has had a minimum 10 hours uninterrupted break prior to commencing this shift?
properties.textTranslation: The technician has had a minimum 10 hours uninterrupted break prior to commencing this shift?

properties.name: richtext_label_25
properties.text: The technician is not suffering from a shortage of sleep on the previous day or night?
properties.textTranslation: The technician is not suffering from a shortage of sleep on the previous day or night?

properties.name: richtext_label_27
properties.text: The technician will not be performing heavy physical work?
properties.textTranslation: The technician will not be performing heavy physical work?

properties.name: richtext_label_29
properties.text: The technician will not be exposed to excessive heat, cold, hazardous substances or conditions?
properties.textTranslation: The technician will not be exposed to excessive heat, cold, hazardous substances or conditions?

properties.name: richtext_label_33
properties.text: Is mobile phone coverage or other means of communication (e.g. use of satellite phone) available?
properties.textTranslation: Is mobile phone coverage or other means of communication (e.g. use of satellite phone) available?

properties.name: richtext_label_35
properties.text:
If any of the above questions are answered in the negative, the following precautions must be taken:

  • The Technician must be willing and able to continue working safely.
  • The task must not involve sustained heavy work.
  • The task assigned must not involve high risk.
  • The task assigned must not be undertaken without reasonable assistance.
  • Senior Manager must be comfortable with the decision.
properties.textTranslation:
If any of the above questions are answered in the negative, the following precautions must be taken:

  • The Technician must be willing and able to continue working safely.
  • The task must not involve sustained heavy work.
  • The task assigned must not involve high risk.
  • The task assigned must not be undertaken without reasonable assistance.
  • Senior Manager must be comfortable with the decision.

properties.name: richtext_label_36
properties.text: If any of these precautions cannot be fulfilled, the Senior Manager WILL NOT approve extended hours or days.
properties.textTranslation: If any of these precautions cannot be fulfilled, the Senior Manager WILL NOT approve extended hours or days.
